channel.title: How do i change what NPCs say?
channel.description:
Okay i'm new to making servers, and i just got a sorce and it says welcome too "blah blah blah.." But i want it to say.. "Welcome To ScimmyScape." right when you log in theres a menu that says welcome to "blah blah blah," but again i want that changed to "Welcome to ScimmyScape." and then theres admins in the dummy / shop area that say welcome to "blah blah blah.."
If you want to e see for yourself then join my ham and log on..
Ham info ScimmyScape -User 123 -pass port -43595

item.title: How do i change what NPCs say?
item.dc:creator: @ScimmyScape ScimmyScape
item.description:
@ScimmyScape wrote:

I don’t see where i chage it, whenever i look over that long notepad it says like yyc java blah lol, nothing about what NPCs are saying

Read full topic
